title: Guys, a permanent chatrestriction won't work
body:
I've seen quite alot of posts about this recently. "Don't permaban, just remove their ability to chat".

This WON'T WORK. Riot did this before, I were around at that time, and it didn't help. Instead of flaming, they would just troll the games instead.

Learn how to fucking behave. So tired or people that tries to find other sorts of punishments. Just BEHAVE, and you WON'T get punished. It isn't that hard.

replies.body: We've had "we've had this thread before" threads before, too. The people who are making threads on topics like "y no permamute" and "rito steal muh account" aren't regular Boards users who've seen these frequently-posted topics. They experience something in game, like feeders or a chat restriction or unbalanced matchmaking, and they log in to make a thread. They may linger for a while, and then they move on. Either ignore the repetitive threads or prepare a copypasta, otherwise you'll go nuts dealing with the constant low-quality content.

This^^

And honestly, even if it worked, why should riot let toxic people play their game? If someone has broken rules so many times that they'd get perma chat muted etc, why should they be allowed to play the game? 
Perma bans encourage reforming etc, because perma ban is quite a harsh punishment and losing the account you've spent money and time on hurts quite a lot, which is the point of the punishment. You're supposed to feel bad and learn from your actions
BeCaUsE hUrR dUrR jUsT mUtE
U can mute if ur feelings get hurt by mere words by some stranger online if yiu really wana grow up instead of telling the teacher someone called u trash
Alternatively, the person flaming can grow up and realize people have bad games and shit happens (or whatever the excuse is).
